pages.text: The $(mob)Stinger$() is a monster that spawns in caves of the $(thing)Midnight$(). It attacks players on sight by trying to get into melee to deliver a sting that inflicts $(thing)Weakness$() on its target. $(thing)Stinger Eggs$() can be commonly found in clusters in the caves of the $(thing)Midnight$(), which hatch into baby $(mob)Stingers$() when a player steps on them.
$(mob)Stingers$() drop $(item)Stinger Eggs$() on death. These are a decent source of food when cooked, and can also be used to spawn new baby $(mob)Stingers$().
